TourInfo.Description: As with all our vacations, this itinerary features specially-organized sightseeing and first-hand experiences throughout. ItinerarySegment.Title: Arrive in London, England
ItinerarySegment.Text: Take an included transfer to your hotel. The rest of the day is free.

ItinerarySegment.Title: London / Stonehenge / Bath / Plymouth
ItinerarySegment.Text: Visit Stonehenge and the elegant Roman Baths in Bath. On to Plymouth. Enjoy a British pub meal and drinks at a Welcome Pub Reception.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Cornish Excursion
ItinerarySegment.Text: View the Mayflower steps and the Royal Citadel. On to St. Ives. See St. Michael’s Mount, then back to Plymouth.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Plymouth / Cardiff, Wales
ItinerarySegment.Text: In Bovey Tracey, get a Unique Insight at the Riverside Mill with the contempory crafts of The Devon Guild of Craftsmen. Savor a Be My Guest lunch on a working dairy farm. Then, head to Cardiff.
ItinerarySegment.Accommodation: Park Inn Hotel Cardiff City Centre

ItinerarySegment.Title: Cardiff / Liverpool, England
ItinerarySegment.Text: Stop to view the ruins of Tintern Abbey. Then on to Chester for a walking tour including views of the “Rows.” In Liverpool, take a Beatles drive with a Local Expert.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Liverpool / Glasgow, Scotland
ItinerarySegment.Text: Drive through ideal Lake District scenery, along Lake Windermere and on to Scotland. In Glasgow, relish a Highlight Dinner of Scottish fare.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Glasgow / Scottish Highlands
ItinerarySegment.Text: Travel along Loch Lomond to Glencoe. Stop at the Commando Memorial for views of Ben Nevis. Then head into the Highlands.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Highlands & Skye Excursion
ItinerarySegment.Text: Travel past lochs and glens to board a ferry bound for the beguiling Isle of Skye. Returning to your hotel, glimpse Eilean Donan Castle and Loch Ness.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Scottish Highlands / Edinburgh
ItinerarySegment.Text: Stop in St. Andrews, where golf was “born.” Then cross to Edinburgh. During the Edinburgh Festival, tickets to the Military Tattoo are included.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Edinburgh Sightseeing & Free Time
ItinerarySegment.Text: See the highlights of Edinburgh on a morning tour with a Local Guide. The rest of the day is free to explore on your own.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Edinburgh / York, England
ItinerarySegment.Text: Cross back into England and visit medieval Alnwick. In York, a walking tour includes views of the Shambles and York Minster. Later, savor a Farewell Dinner.

ItinerarySegment.Title: York / Stratford / London
ItinerarySegment.Text: Visit Shakespeare’s birthplace, then see Anne Hathaway’s cottage. In Oxford, visit one of the colleges. Later, return to London.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Depart London
ItinerarySegment.Text: You will be transferred to the airport (conditions apply) where your vacation ends.
